description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTRubellaHighIncidence for IMMZ.D2.DT.Rubella.High incidence. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a rubella vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Countries with high incidence and mortality from rubella
